thread.title: BRIEF-Centene Makes Initial Investment In Pharmacy Benefit Manager, RxAdvance

title: BRIEF-Centene Makes Initial Investment In Pharmacy Benefit Manager, RxAdvance
text: 18 AM / Updated 14 minutes ago BRIEF-Centene Makes Initial Investment In Pharmacy Benefit Manager, RxAdvance Reuters Staff March 13 (Reuters) - Centene Corp:​ * CENTENE AND RXADVANCE ESTABLISH TRANSFORMATIVE PARTNERSHIP TO CREATE NEXT GENERATION PHARMACY MANAGEMENT SOLUTION * CENTENE SAYS MADE INITIAL INVESTMENT IN RXADVANCE, A FULL-SERVICE PHARMACY BENEFIT MANAGER * CENTENE CORP - ‍RAVI IKA WILL CONTINUE IN HIS CURRENT ROLE AS CEO OF RXADVANCE * CENTENE CORP - AS PART OF INITIAL TRANSACTION, CENTENE HAS CERTAIN RIGHTS TO EXPAND ITS EQUITY INVESTMENT IN FUTURE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
